featured.name: PathQuest
featured.tagline: Track your summits. Discover new peaks. Conquer challenges.
featured.description: A full-stack web and mobile platform for mountain peak baggers, built in ~6 weeks using AI-powered development. Integrates with Strava to automatically detect summit attempts, features powerfully interactive Mapbox visualizations, and transforms raw athlete activity data into actionable insights.
features: Full-stack web + cross-platform mobile app in 6 weeks
AI-powered development with Cursor for high-velocity shipping
ML + LiDAR DEM scans for accurate peak coordinates
Scalable Google Cloud architecture (Cloud Run, serverless)
Direct user feedback loops with ultrarunning community

other.name: Standard Communities
other.description: Built a proprietary data tool for the affordable housing universe that drove multi-million dollar deal making decisions. Full ownership of the stack: data ingestion, LLM enhancements, confidence-scored joining, and unified frontend.
highlights: AI-powered data enhancements with Flash LLMs
Rapid iteration with regular end-user feedback

other.name: AI Endurance
other.description: Ground-up redesign of a legacy endurance training platform. Translated customer feedback into high-impact features that directly improved usability and engagement.
highlights: Hundreds of thousands of monthly page views

other.name: 33Floors
other.description: Team lead for customer-facing software development. Partnered with CTO/CEO to translate business needs into features, thriving in ambiguity and leveraging AI to accelerate delivery.
highlights: ETL pipeline: 100s of GB in <30 minutes

other.name: This Portfolio
other.description: A topographic-themed portfolio site with animated contour lines, parallax mountains, glassmorphism, and dark/light mode. Built with AI-powered development.
